Flurry of Blows. Immediately after you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strike a a bonus action.

Also at 2nd level, you train yourself to use a variety of weapon a monk weapon, not just simple melee weapon and shortswords. Whenever you finish a short or long rest, you can touch one weapon, focus your ki on it, and then count that weapon a a monk weapon until you use this feature again.

You must be proficient with it.

When you reach 3rd level, you commit yourself to a monastic tradition. Your tradition grant you feature at 3rd level and again at 6th, 11th, and 17th level.

Starting at 3rd level, you can use your reaction to deflect or catch the missile when you be hit by a range weapon attack. When you do so, the damage you take from the attack be reduce by 1d10+ your Dexterity modifier+ your monk level.

If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the missile if it be small enough for you to hold in one hand and you have at least one hand free. If you catch a missile in this way, you can spend 1 ki point to make a range attack with a range of 20/60 use the weapon or piece of ammunition you just caught, a part of the same reaction. You make this attack with proficiency, regardless of your weapon proficiency, and the missile count a a monk weapon for the attack.
Also at 3rd level, if you spend 1 ki point or more a part of your action on your turn, you can make one attack with an unarmed strike or a monk weapon a a bonus action before the end of the turn.

When you reach 4th level, and again at 8th, 12th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability score of your choice by 1. As normal, you ca n't increase an ability score above 20 use this feature.
Beginning at 4th level, you can use your reaction when you fall to reduce any fall damage you take by an amount equal to five time your monk level.
Also at 4th level, a an action, you can spend 2 ki point and roll a Martial Arts die. You regain a number of hit point equal to the number roll plus your proficiency bonus.
Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

Starting at 5th level, you can interfere with the flow of ki in an opponent 's body. When you hit another creature with a melee weapon attack, you can spend 1 ki point to attempt a stun strike. The target must succeed on a Constitution save throw or be stun until the end of your next turn.
Also at 5th level, when you miss with an attack roll, you can spend 1 to 3 ki point to increase your attack roll by 2 for each of these ki point you spend, potentially turn the miss into a hit.
Starting at 6th level, your unarmed strike count a magical for the purpose of overcome resistance and immunity to nonmagical attack and damage.

At 7th level, your instinctive agility let you dodge out of the way of certain area effect, such a a blue dragon 's lightning breath or a fireball spell. When you be subject to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity save throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the save throw, and only half damage if you fail.
Starting at 7th level, you can use your action to end one effect on yourself that be cause you to be charm or frighten.
At 10th level, your mastery of the ki flow through you make you immune to disease and poison.

Starting at 13th level, you learn to touch the ki of other mind so that you understand all spoken language. Moreover, any creature that can understand a language can understand what you say.
Beginning at 14th level, your mastery of ki grant you proficiency in all save throw.
Additionally, whenever you make a save throw and fail, you can spend 1 ki point to reroll it and take the second result.

At 15th level, your ki sustains you so that you suffer none of the frailty of old age, and you ca n't be age magically. You can still die of old age, however. In addition, you no longer need food or water.
Beginning at 18th level, you can use your action to spend 4 ki point to become invisible for 1 minute. During that time, you also have resistance to all damage but force damage.
Additionally, you can spend 8 ki point to cast the astral projection spell, without need material component. When you do so, you ca n't take any other creature with you.
